title: Huge Bug
body: i got into a game and then it said attempting to reconnect, i waited for 5 min so i closed the game and tried to reconnect but then it kept crashing. So i closed the hole game and reopened it and then it said there may be possible corruption to your league client. I dont wanna get banned for this just because of this bug.

replies.body: Biggest bug I've ever seen was on starship troopers
Hi, this exact problem happened to me, I fixed it by uninstalling lolreplay
Just got into another game to c if its fixed but its doing the same thing, i cant cast abilities but i can watch what is  is happening but i cant move and it says attempting to reconnect.
Still cant reconnect after re patch fix
